changes.change: Optimize performance, fix the crash issue on old devices
Add the long press to delete continue playing
Can jump to playing history conveniently by check more button at continue playing
Fix the crash issue that when start play and rotate the screen at the same time with default player
Disabled the pan gestures while vlc player screen is locked
Add a switch in settings to control tv shows play next episode automatically
Add movie, tv show, actors and movielist's review.
Add subscene and google search for subtitles
Add a switch in settings to control tv shows play next episode automatically
